title: Evidentiary burden
context: [ยง485A-503] Evidentiary burden. (a) In a civil action or administrative proceeding under this chapter, a person claiming an exemption, exception, preemption, or exclusion shall have the burden to prove the applicability of the claim. (b) In a criminal proceeding under this chapter, a person claiming an exemption, exception, preemption, or exclusion shall have the burden of going forward with evidence of the claim. [L 2006, c 229, pt of ยง1]
